Integrated Modules

£20

per doctor per module per year all doctors

>10

SARD:360

  • End to end multi-source feedback
  • Colleague and patient survey dispatch and collation
  • A choice of dispatch methods to meet your organisation's needs
  • Feedback analysis and benchmarking
  • Personalised printable report

SARD:JP

  • Intuitive Job Planning module
  • Simultaneous collaboration between doctor and supervisor(s)
  • Easy integration into Appraisal and Revalidation.
  • Converts to PDF to allow non-SARD access

SARD:Ed

  • Our Educators Appraisal module is currently being developed and should be ready by the end of 2013
